This weapon is upgraded as you complete specific quests to unseal the Genesis Weapon.|After completing the quest |[Genesis Weapon] Power Unbound, Stage 1|, the weapon will be unsealed with the |Tanadian Ruin| Skill unlocked.|After completing the quest |[Genesis Weapon] Power Unbound, Stage 2|, the following upgrades will be applied:
|Complete scrolling with Spell Trace 15% Weapon Enhancements (cannot be changed)|
|22 Star Force Enhancements (cannot be changed)|
|Unique Potential (can be changed)|
|Epic Bonus Potential (can be changed)|
|Unlocked |Aeonian Rise| Skill
